name: Ballsy Escape
description:
Escape the castle by overcoming obstacles. 

In this game you are a green ball, trying to escape imprisonment.

You can escape only by paying with your life.

 How to play?
  • Arrow keys to move around and jump.
  • R to restart.
  • S to open the shop.
  • Enter to purchase.
  • Space to place a box.
  • C to open a chest.
